text: Botanical Studies is a peer-reviewed open access scientific journal covering all aspects of botany. It is published by Springer Science+Business Media and affiliated with the Institute of Plant and Microbial Biology (Academia Sinica, Taiwan). The editors-in-chief are Mei-Chu Chung and Yaw-Huei Lin (Academia Sinica). The journal was established in 1947 as the Botanical Bulletin of Academia Sinica, receiving its current title in 2006. ==Abstracting and indexing== The journal is abstracted and indexed in: According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2016 impact factor of 1.452. ==References== ==External links== * * Institute of Plant and Microbial Biology, Academia Sinica, Taiwan Category:English-language journals Category:Publications established in 1947 Category:Botany journals Category:Creative Commons Attribution-licensed journals Category:Springer Science+Business Media academic journals Category:Open access journals Category:Academic journals of Taiwan
title: Botanical Studies
